title: Modularity and integration
body:
The idea si that. For example, we have a runtime environment.
Any JS or other script engine in system registers in this server.
Any app which needs JS engine can query the server for a list of engines which support some feature. Then the server gives the app list of engines. Then the app instantiates a class which implements standartized interface for interaction between JS or other engine and an app.Then the app can use this standartized interface to execute code, inject functions implemented by app into js instance....
